titleInfo.title: Grand Ball & Tableau! at Werlein Hall

name.namePart: George J, Kerth, lithographer, New Orleans, La.

mods.abstract: Cats and dogs are singing and playing instruments in front of the Moon Beam Inn.
mods.note: Independent Order of the Moon Mardi Gras ball invitation. A sign stating "A live goose is better than a dead lion" hangs from a pole.

titleInfo.title: William W. King and Family Papers, Mss. 1282 UU:47, Box 31

copyInformation.subLocation: LSU Special Collections: Louisiana and Lower Mississippi Valley Image Resources Collection

mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.
